comment._content: genforum.genealogy.com/nc/stokes/messages/122.html Indicates that he was married to Martha Elizabeth Southern in 1850 and had at least one son, William Pearson Hicks. www.speightfamily.net/data/f_12c8.htm#8 Gives them three children, William Pearson, Eliza, and Susan A.
